Title: Let Fly!
Description:
Hm. This Anub'azal gave the orders that led to the prisoners' escape. Zev'kall here didn't seem very pleased with that.

So how about this--you sneak into Siegehold, and make best friends with Anub'azal. Easy.

I've noticed a lot of cargo being ferried over, I'm sure no one would notice if we just swapped out the contents of a particular crate.

In the meantime, I'll share our discoveries with the Weaver. I'd love to come with you, but I'd rather not tempt more Flynn stabbings today.
ObjectivesText: Stow away into a box to be carried into Siegehold.
RewardText:
What an interesting "delivery" you are.

I have use for you.
